comments:
Using Eclipse 3.2 RC7

While adding org.eclipse.osgi to the Automated Management Dependencies list, the following NPE was thrown and written to the .log file.  The org.eclipse.osgi plugin was not added to the list.  My project DID NOT have a build.properties file, which the PDE did not detect.  While I grant you that this is not a traditional path, it is certainly a real one.  If build.properties does not exist, I would suggest that the PDE adds one on-demand.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2006-06-08 14:15:11.974
!MESSAGE java.lang.NullPointerException
